title: Marketing Automation Strategist / Specialist
job_overview:
About Us

CareAbout began with a simple idea over a cup of coffee in Highett, Melbourne in 2014. Our mission is to make a difference by helping Australians find the best care solutions for their loved ones. Since assisting our first customer in 2017, we have helped over 140,000 Australians, empowering them with clear information and compassionate service.

Our Purpose
- Make a difference
- Empower people through clear information
- Provide services that improve lives
- Source exceptional-quality home-care providers
- Simplify complex government jargon
- Operate with love and compassion

Our Values
- Champion positivity
- Be accountable
- We are one team
- Courage counts
- Strive to be your best
- Embrace the adventure

Who We Are Looking For
An automation obsessive who lives for customer journeys, segmentation logic, and data-driven optimisation. You won’t be writing copy or designing templates, that’s handled by our creative team. Instead, you’ll architect and maintain every automated touchpoint, ensuring each message lands in the right inbox at precisely the right Upgrade to see actual infont and moves the needle on engagement and revenue. You’re as comfortable mapping complex behavioural flows as you are diving into dashboards to spot a dip in click-through rates.

Key Responsibilities

Journey Architecture - Build, audit, and refine 17 + multi-channel journeys (email, SMS, onsite pop-ups) to match lifecycle stages and strategic goals.

Segmentation & Targeting - Create sophisticated, rule-based segments using demographic, behavioural, and transactional data from Salesforce and other sources.

Cross-Functional Orchestration - Brief copywriters and designers on timing, context, and variant needs; QA content once inserted.

Platform Mastery - Own the automation layer across Ortto (primary) plus legacy or parallel tools (Klaviyo, HubSpot, Mailchimp, Campaign Monitor, Salesforce Marketing Cloud).

Data Integrity & Integrations - Ensure bi-directional syncs, field mappings, and triggers between Salesforce and marketing platforms stay accurate and fast.

Performance Analytics - Track open rates, clicks, conversions, time-to-engage, and unsubscribe trends; surface insights; run weekly health checks.

Testing & Optimisation Design A/B and multivariate tests (timing, frequency, logic) and implement winner deployment protocols.

Strategic Alignment - Translate high-level lifecycle strategy into detailed flow diagrams, documented logic, and prioritised backlogs.

Continuous Improvement - Proactively propose new journeys, sunset under-performing ones, and recommend data or tooling enhancements.

Key Competencies & Attributes

Systems Thinker – sees the entire customer lifecycle, not isolated campaigns.
Data-Driven – instincts backed by SQL/BI fluency and comfort in Google Sheets or Tableau.
Automation Toolbelt – advanced user of at least two tools from Klaviyo, HubSpot, Mailchimp, Campaign Monitor, Salesforce Marketing Cloud; able to learn Ortto fast.
Stakeholder Translator – turns marketing goals into technical requirements and vice versa.
Detail Hawk – catches broken merge tags, faulty logic branches, and deliverability red flags before they happen.
Continuous Learner – tracks deliverability best practice, privacy regulations, and new platform features.
Sharp Communicator - takes initiative to drive collaborative communication whenever needed. 

Experience & Qualifications

Essential
3 + years in marketing automation or lifecycle marketing roles.
Demonstrated ownership of complex, multi-step customer journeys (ideally 10 k + contacts).
Proven results in improving key metrics (open rate, CTR, retention, revenue per send).
Hands-on integration work with Salesforce (Campaigns, Leads, Contacts, Opportunities).
Comfortable briefing creative, then QA-ing final assets inside the automation platform.

Highly Advantageous
Prior work in aged-care, health, insurance, or another high-compliance sector.
Experience migrating journeys between platforms or standing up a new CDP/ESP.
Basic HTML/CSS for troubleshooting templates.

Desirable
Bachelor’s degree in marketing, data science, or related field.
Certifications: HubSpot Marketing Software, Klaviyo Product, Salesforce Administrator, etc.

How to Apply
Ready to architect journeys that make a real difference in people’s lives? Apply with your CV and a short case study of a lifecycle flow you built or optimised, show us the logic, the metrics, and the outcome.
